creditline: Gift of Dr. Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg in honor of Elizabeth K. Mix (Menon)
description: two pairs of fish on bottom center and in center; bottom pair are long and slender with peach and blue pigment; the center pair are rendered in black and gray pigment; stingray in ULC; recoiled octopus in URC
medium: Black ink and watercolor wash on laid paper
provenance: [Eric Carlson, New York; until 1998; sold, August 13, to Mix]; Elizabeth Mix, Indianapolis (given to Weisbergs); Yvonne and Gabriel Weisberg, Minneapolis (until 2018; given to Mia)
title: Untitled (Fish, Stingray, and Octopus)
